duties_responsibilities.duty: Secure new store and remodel project awards virtually (by phone) on equipment package bids provided by NDCP to Dunkin’ restaurant franchisees based on targeted quotas
Provide highly responsive support and guidance to franchisees on questions associated with NDCP’s project bids (quotations)
Generate leads and build new relationships by organizing daily work schedule to call on new Dunkin’ franchisees and networks not currently utilizing NDCP’s equipment solution
Develop customer profiles and create targeted action plan by territory and profile type using data analysis, growth projections, and highest ROI opportunities
Maintain working relationships and connection with existing NDCP clients to ensure that they receive exceptional service and to identify new growth opportunities
Cross training and backup support for Equipment Specialist functions as required (managing projects, bid preparation, etc.)
Prepare concise and accurate reports, sales analysis, and other required documentation for executive-level presentations
Support obtaining member feedback prior to and upon project completion
Become proficient with using customer relationship and project management system

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in business related field preferred (Sales/Marketing, HR, or similar)
